title: Tesla Reports Diminished Profit Amid Rising Competition : What Investors Need to Know , ETAuto
description: Tesla's profit has fallen significantly as the company faces increasing competition from rivals like Volkswagen and BYD. Despite the decline, investors remain optimistic about CEO Elon Musk's future plans for self-driving taxis and AI collaborations., Tesla's profit has fallen significantly as the company faces increasing competition from rivals like Volkswagen and BYD. Despite the decline, investors remain optimistic about CEO Elon Musk's future plans for self-driving taxis and AI collaborations.

# Tesla profit slumps, but investors may not care

Price cuts were made to counter competition from rivals like Volkswagen and BYD. Despite this, Tesla's stock is performing well. Investors are betting on future success in self-driving taxis and robots.

![Jack Ewing](https://auto.economictimes.indiatimes.com/Themes/Release/theme4/images/icons/et-default-user.svg)
